name: Swiftstep Storm Scout

investigation.name: Sauroform Tribal Warriors
investigation.description: The warriors of Natlan's six great tribes who fight for the honor and glory of their people.\nOver long years of living and fighting alongside their Saurian companions, these tribal warriors have gradually acquired their traits and learned how to apply them on the field of battle.

description: A warrior from the Canopy, and a tribal guardian that patrols the forest valleys and mountain streams.\nIt is said that these sword-wielding tribal warriors stand under trees and cut every leaf that falls over the course of a day in order to hone their fighting skills. But just as leaves fall silently, so are the slashes of these swift couriers soundless.
